kubernetes-credentials.name: Kubernetes Credentials
kubernetes-credentials.description: Credentials block for generating configured Kubernetes API clients.
kubernetes-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Kubernetes credentials:
```python
from prefect_kubernetes.credentials import KubernetesCredentials

kubernetes_credentials = KubernetesCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: KubernetesCredentials
fields.description: Credentials block for generating configured Kubernetes API clients.

KubernetesClusterConfig.title: KubernetesClusterConfig
KubernetesClusterConfig.description:
Stores configuration for interaction with Kubernetes clusters.

See `from_file` for creation.

config.title: Config
config.description: The entire contents of a kubectl config file.

context_name.title: Context Name
context_name.description: The name of the kubectl context to use.

k8s-job.name: Kubernetes Job
k8s-job.description: A block representing a Kubernetes job configuration.
k8s-job.code_example:
```python
from prefect_kubernetes.jobs import KubernetesJob

k8s_job_block = KubernetesJob.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: KubernetesJob
fields.description: A block representing a Kubernetes job configuration.

v1_job.title: Job Manifest
v1_job.description: The Kubernetes job manifest to run. This dictionary can be produced using `yaml.safe_load`.

api_kwargs.title: Additional API Arguments
api_kwargs.description: Additional arguments to include in Kubernetes API calls.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: The credentials to configure a client from.

delete_after_completion.title: Delete After Completion
delete_after_completion.description: Whether to delete the job after it has completed.

interval_seconds.title: Interval Seconds
interval_seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait between job status checks.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: The namespace to create and run the job in.

timeout_seconds.title: Timeout Seconds
timeout_seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait for the job run before timing out.
